name: Teleport Tower (RetroMMO, Osyris, Ragchomp, thlurp)
description:
Teleport Tower is a "Foddian" platformer where you navigate the map with a portal gun. It was created in 10 days as a submission for Ludwig Jam. It was made with plain old Typescript and HTML, using no preexisting game engine.

Programming: RetroMMO
Graphics: bampikku and thlurp
Audio: Ragchomp

Source code: https://github.com/retro-mmo-com/Teleport-Tower
